item.title: Proxmox: Infra as code with terraform
item.description: This post details how to create a virtual machine with Terraform on your proxmox infrastructure. Table of contents Prerequisites Configure Proxmox as Code Cloud-init custom config Prerequisites Terraform installed on your system AlmaLinux cloudinit template on your promox system Configure Create a main.tf file and install the provider Telmate/promox terraform { required_providers { proxmox = { source = "Telmate/proxmox" version = "2.9.0" } } } Run terraform init to install the provider.
